articles.title: Pentagon: US arms industry struggling to keep up with China - POLITICO
articles.description: A draft copy of the new National Defense Industrial Strategy says American companies can't build weapons fast enough to meet global demand.
articles.content: The document, dated Nov. 27, adds that just as significantly, the traditional defense contractors in the [defense industrial base] would be challenged to respond to modern conflict at the velocity, s… [+3256 chars]

articles.title: 'American icon': Biden pays tribute to Sandra Day O'Connor - POLITICO
articles.description: Biden praised O'Connor's dedication to public service and the “bedrock American principle of an independent judiciary."
articles.content: As a U.S. Senator on the Judiciary Committee, I remember the hope surrounding her historic nomination to the Supreme Court. The Senate voted 99-0 in her favor, proof that our nation can come together… [+2414 chars]
